website_summaries.verdict: Even if you don't give two licks about its cool modular capabilities, get the Motorola Moto Z for an affordable phone with an impressively enduring battery life.
pros: The affordable Moto Z Play works with swappable modular accessories, retains its headphone jack (unlike the more upmarket Moto Z and Z Force) and has a battery that goes on and on
cons: The Z Play is the thickest and heaviest phone in the Moto Z series and its fingerprint sensor, annoyingly, can be mistaken for a home button

customer_reviews.title: **READ** This is NOT the Verizon Droid edition. It is the US GSM unlocked edition
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why they decided to change the title of this phone to the Verizon version, but it's not. It's unlocked and can be used with GSM carriers. I have a T-Mobile SIM in mine now and it works just fine. Anyway, the phone itself is great. Beautiful display, a loud, clear front facing speaker, runs incredibly smooth and of course the battery is a beast. Plus, you get a free style mod in the box. For 400 bucks (though I got mine for 350), you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother looking at a Galaxy. This is a lot of phone at a much lower price.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe just how much phone I got for this price. The OS is extremely intuitive and has no idiosyncrasies. Screen quality is excellent, the camera is so good that I don't understand why an external camera module is made for it. It's just a great phone all-around. Incidentally I use this with Straight Talk.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxter

customer_reviews.title: I loved this phone but...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on recommendation from my niece. The phone takes great pictures, was reliable using GPS, streams music and video wonderfully. I barely used the functionally for about one year but really started using full functionality in 2018. It is 2 years 8 mths, and the battery has started to drain at a mind boggling rate without much warning. At 50% it just shut itself off. It could be something else but the apps are stable. Motorola phones supposedly have long life spans so I am a little disappointed. Maybe 2 to 3 years is expected? I don't know but that's what I got out of mine. Overall though I really loved this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Phone died after 10 months.
customer_reviews.text: The phone has ALWAYS been in a case and ALWAYS had a screen protector. I went to power cycle the phone and now the screen is completely black. There is nothing there. I tried to restart it again, you can hear the start up sounds and notifications, and even the volume down and power button trick. Nothing can get this phone to work again. I might replace the screen later. I contacted Motorola support because this phone should be under a 12 month warranty, but because it was bought through an "unauthorized" re-seller, they refuse to do any service on it. The seller, North to South, has yet to contact me back on this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Sold Nexus 6P for this
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not cheap as it should be. Got mine on Swappa for $300. Can't complain. Faster (!) than my ex Nexus 6P with outstanding battery life. This is hands down. You won't find a better phone in this department. Camera is worse in low light, but that's not a big deal to me. Battery life, fool!
customer_reviews.author: Behemoth

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with AT&T data plans
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone because it said in the description it would work with AT&T. Brought it to the AT&T store to activate, and they said it would make phone calls, but couldn't accept data. They tried several times to add a network manually and it wouldn't accept the changes. Not fully unlocked. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Bad batteries
customer_reviews.text: Defective battery. Wasn't to swell and blow up after 8 months to a year of use. Popped the screen off over time due to swelling. Same issue when I got the version 3 too.
customer_reviews.author: John Yates

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z Play is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This phone has everything I could possibly want, and with the Moto mods, it promises ever more! It's fast and reliable and the split screen view is so cool! I can text and watch videos at the same time, or sure the net or...darn near anything! Screen resolution is bar none and the 16 megapixel back can is ridiculously powerful for a cell phone. I'm super excited to get the projector mod and the Alexa speaker mod! Phone accessories were never this cool! It beams into from one phone to another just by, "kissing," the phones together! So cool!
customer_reviews.author: David Lou Hildau Couture

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding phone quality, just buy a case quickly since the phone is thin!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, I use a Tracphone cardpay-plan, realistically my phone bill is less than $150 a year, finally a phone that has excellent storage, processing, and camera clarity. Mods are also a cool idea but for the prices Motorola sells them at, be wary of it's potential value/use to you. **side note the only annoying thing about this phone would be the lack of a USB-C to USB cable, at least they're relatively cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life, little bloatware
customer_reviews.text: I did manage to break the screen on it but that was my own doing - whacked it on a concrete corner. I got it for the lack of bloatware (all MOTO apps can be disabled and/or removed, and there are not that many of them anyway) and for the excellent battery life - I get 2 days while still playing a lot of games.
customer_reviews.author: Lynelle V

customer_reviews.title: Clearly not a speedy flagship phone but it's definitely not slow at all.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the latest and greatest flagship phones for years until I didn't care much for them since my everyday use isn't intensive at all. All the phones in the past had one thing in common: Needs constant charging! This phone can go for days without charging, this kind of convenience ranks high for me. LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Problems after only one year
customer_reviews.text: The phone started out great. However, after just one year the battery quit holding a charge. After replacing the battery the phone started eating up my battery life making me assume that it was not the battery that was the problem but the phone itself. A fully charged battery would not even last me 2 hours even when I was not using my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone plus battery life best on any phone. I will put this phone against any flagship. Try it you can always get refund if not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Capocci

customer_reviews.title: I broke up with iPhone and have no regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Unlocked version. Impressive battery life, voice activation, and the mods -- projector & Hasselblad -- make this one of a kind and impossible to beat. Also, it's very tough. This is the first phone I haven't put in a candyshell for fear of destruction. I've broken too many overpriced iPhones. iPhone is like the partner you didn't realize was awful until you moved on to a truly great one.
customer_reviews.author: zenBliss

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I was expecting it to be.
customer_reviews.text: It really exceeded my expectations, both in form and function. It's not a high-spec device, but it feels very well built, and it looks and feels like a high end device. Full reviews and tech specs have been done on phone specific websites so I won't regurgitate the same info again, but I will say that battery life and build quality greatly exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kumagoro

customer_reviews.title: Finally an android with a battery that can actually hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally an android with a battery that can actually hold up for the entire day. I've sometimes even forgot to charge my phone before bed and still will have a decent 4-5 hours left the next day. I'm really enjoying this phone right now.
customer_reviews.author: Kez

customer_reviews.title: Better than you expect.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, solid with a premium feel. Works much better than the specs suggest. No BLOAT !! Battery life is great, fingerprint sensor is responsive and intuitive. Stock android for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: tgmotoman

customer_reviews.title: Great phone add ons too expensive
customer_reviews.text: No damages or issues charger works great no issues so far only complaint is it does not come with headphones and the mods are just about as expensive as the phone
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone for the price. It runs smoothly and it has the best battery life I've seen in a smartphone. I definitely recommend to anyone not looking to spend a ridiculous amount of money for a good smartphone
customer_reviews.author: Joby

customer_reviews.title: Useless waist of time. Not compatible with My network.
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed that the seller did not reveal the phone's specific network requirement. Waist of time. Useless. Forced to return. Amazon's return policy made it the easiest.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshie

customer_reviews.title: Phone works
customer_reviews.text: Phone works. It was a Verizon phone at one point and has a bunch of Verizon apps that take up a lot of memory. I get messages daily saying I'm not on Verizon's network.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: The BEST phone I've ever owned, and I've owned many.
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've ever owned. And I purchase a new phone every two years or so. The battery life is amazing! 2 to 3 days per charge with moderate to heavy use. The look, feel, and operation of the phone is absolutely top notch! Fingerprint scanner works flawlessly. My only gripe is that there aren't any really nice cases for the moto z play. Had to settle for a simple one.
customer_reviews.author: D Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone 10 months ago and really love it. I'm not a gamer, although I think it would work well with most games. The large screen size is great. The call quality is good and the speaker is loud enough. I can go a few days without charging this. It works smoothly with no lag. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until battery complete lost ability to charge about ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it until battery complete lost ability to charge about 6 months after I bought it. No solution. Cannot change battery
customer_reviews.author: Wedge

customer_reviews.title: Play store app fail
customer_reviews.text: Google play shut down by itself or phone when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence McSwiggan

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phones I have owned in the past year. Very cheap and works so smooth. I have finally retired it for a Note 8 but I still miss the phone and the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Douda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Battery life, Pure Android, Awesome modes
customer_reviews.text: Phone is big and heavy, but it became usual these days. Battery lasts long (30-40 hours - 4G network + wifi + some gaming, browsing web). 5GHz wifi hotspot option and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Emin Mastizada

customer_reviews.title: Love it even more than my Samsung Galaxy's
customer_reviews.text: Love it even more than my Samsung Galaxy's. Up to this point it is by far the best phone that I have ever owned and I go back to bag phones. Price point is also an excellent selling point for this device, when a person considers everything the Moto Z has built-in to it.
customer_reviews.author: William Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easily the Best phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone. Upgraded from my htc and couldnt be happier. This phone is underated for many reasons. Battery life is unbelievible. All Day without charging and if you buy the motomod battery pack it can go easily 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: D-MAN

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Unreal battery life. Started using it (videos, texts, map navigation, etc) since the morning with full charge and ended with 70% at night. Charging is super fast. Decent processing speed and camera. Full HD resolution. Truly a hidden gem. Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Performs as expected. Bigger than my previous Moto X, but that's what I wanted, so no complain there. All other features are standard. The battery is AMAZING though, could last for days with normal usage. I use my phone a lot, including syncing from multiple email accounts, many push notifications...but I so far haven't had the need to charge it during the day. Bottom line is you cannot find a better phone under $400.
customer_reviews.author: austin_fob

customer_reviews.title: Love the screen size and battery life!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen size,camera,fingerprint sensor and the fact that now when I go to work and use it all day I don't have to come home and immediately charge my phone because battery life is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, call quality is very good
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, call quality is very good. The battery is my favorite feature. Screen quality and performance are also very good. After factoring in the price, this phone is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jarel Cajigas

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a mostly a standard right now but this 5.5 inch display is vibrant and has a lot to deliver. It's delivers a lot of colors and really shows but considering that it's super AMOLED. I have no issues with this phone. Great buy😊
customer_reviews.author: Berton Miginigad

customer_reviews.title: Best battery life out there
customer_reviews.text: Best battery life out there! Other than that, it's a an android - nothing to really set it apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great deal if you can get it cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: Great battery and pretty fast. I bought this from the warehouse like new. Currently using on cricket just had to make one setting to receive pics in mms
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: OMG. I love the battery.
customer_reviews.text: OMG. I love the battery life. Phone seems plenty fast and screen is nice. Excellent bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Sucky
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this phone it said it was a T mobile but its have trouble "connecting" to any network? Also the sim card and sd card will not work. I'm very disappointed and want my money back. Not worth 1$
customer_reviews.author: Marty Adams

customer_reviews.title: Phone was good looking and nice aside from this but seeing as ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone was advertised by EdgeCellular as GSM unlocked but was actually bound to Verizon SIM cards. Phone was good looking and nice aside from this but seeing as I did not have a Verizon SIM card I had to return this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Michau

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best one in the same price. Worth to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Phone (GSM Model)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Phone. Great Battery Life & no third party apps to bother u. Pure Android system & It supports all major USA GSM bands & many international bands if u are going outside USA. It is also very fast and good looking in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I was very happy that I waited til after the holidays to purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my fiance as a last Christmas present, and I was very happy that I wanted til after the holidays to purchase it considering it was on sale. The package arrived on time! and he loved he, he thought he'd never get this phone so didn't bother fantasying about it, I'm glad I was able to make him happy, and he keeps talking about all the mods he can make to suit his needs to go with it. (Didn't know you could do that) lol Takes great pictures, runs fast, and he loves the finger scanner. No problems yet :D
customer_reviews.author: QiChi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone. Better than my prvious galaxy s7 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone. Better than my prvious galaxy s7 and iphone 7 and very fast. The battery lasts for a full two days minimum even with heavy video streaming use.
customer_reviews.author: ASA BASSAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME phone. Fast, great connectivity after adjusting some settings. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and contemporary
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Wow!! How do I begin to list the impressive attributes of this phone? Let me try. It is slick, fast, sophisticated, ergonomically designed, has unrivalled battery life, reasonably priced (in comparison to others with similar performance specs), sturdy, and contemporary, really a work of art. Ok, I think you get the picture now. And yes, the picture - both the quality and mechanism are first rate and quite easy to use. There is no need to spend more money on the so-called "high end" phones unless you are into sophomoric bragging rights.
customer_reviews.author: T. U.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best phone I've ever had, I love it!! Everything about it is perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite phones I have owned. Battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Parker

customer_reviews.title: it's pretty
customer_reviews.text: Not as customizeable as Samsung phones, but otherwise, it's pretty nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s an older model phone. It works great and was shipped faster than expected. Condition was as described as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best battery life in the market. Incredible phone, except for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Franco Folatelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has the best battery life ever, I use it for 3 days on one full charging.
customer_reviews.author: Manoj Lodhekar

customer_reviews.title: but the battery life is fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Be warned this is a heavy phone, but the battery life is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan P Seymour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of this phone for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen O.

customer_reviews.title: The phone is a good phone.
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone but it has issues. It keep closing apps and turning off unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: amber starkey

customer_reviews.title: The battery life is very nice, I can go three days on a single ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is very nice, I can go three days on a single charge. The only problem is that I can’t find a case for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the purchase. Excellent ! Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Rubén

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Phone
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I've owned so far, and amazing battery life, especially with a battery Moto mod add on.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Reyes

customer_reviews.title: The phone looks pretty good. But USB cable is not there
customer_reviews.text: The phone looks pretty good. But USB cable is not there, Earphones are not there. I am not happy especially that USB cable is not there and it was not mentioned in the product description. I really needed that and now I will have to order separately. Also, the style shell is defective (bent outwards) and does not fit the backside of the phone properly (shown in the photo)
customer_reviews.author: Sai

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone, it feels high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone, it feels high quality, gets insane battery life (2 days easily), has good performance, and moto mods. Some people might not think its worth $450 compared to the specs on some other phones, but it is!
customer_reviews.author: Seol

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a phone to make calls off of, send a few texts, and check your email every so often, this is the phone for you. Anything more, you should probably look into something with a higher price tag. The camera is very pixelated and unless you have good lighting and are absolutely still, it will not take good pictures. As soon as you start downloading apps, the phone slows down significantly (which is understandable to a certain extent) and will at times glitch. It is also a rather large phone making it uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandra Plewa

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone the mods are one of the best things about this phone. I have the projector and the camera mod and they are both great I would purchase this again without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Adam G

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome phone. It's my first Motorola phone after using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome phone. It's my first Motorola phone after using the Nexus phones and I like how Motorola added a few nice touches without messing up the basic android functionality. The battery life is phenomenal and performance is great. The fingerprint sensor works very quickly and reliably. My only complaint is the Motorola nagging screen for upgrading android versions which it doesn't seem that you can remove.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miles

customer_reviews.title: no LED notification light, great battery life
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was sick of paying AT&T 900 for a phone every few years, such a rip off, the phone has EXCELLENT battery life, but it's missing stupid things like the LED light for notifications, but it's fine otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: flamingoland

customer_reviews.title: The camera is not the best, but when we add the battery pack mod
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my wife, she likes it. The camera is not the best, but when we add the battery pack mod, it goes days and days. A great feature for when we travel. Additional mods and packs also make this a nice all-rounder device.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Antone

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phone would not active on my service....took to store they couldn't help me....
customer_reviews.author: Camille faulkner

customer_reviews.title: read a lot of reviews that they were horrible, however no issue with them my first go ...
customer_reviews.text: Received product in 7 hours with Same-Day-Delivery. Was delivered by Lasership, read a lot of reviews that they were horrible, however no issue with them my first go around, I guess the Indiana area is just different. Will update this review a month from now with details on how I like the phone, figured I'd at least put down that the same-day-shipping was lightning fast.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Battery for days
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a great phone. Period. There's normally something about a phone that's a nuisance, this phone - none of that. Great batter life, screen is beautiful, and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Koller

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z Play -- 2 time loser.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone because I love the Moto Mod concept... that said, I am 0 for 2 with this phone. DO NOT BUY. I've had the display go out twice on two separate phones. If I could give it negative stars I would. The display went out this time after putting in my pocket from the restaurant and driving 5 min to my parents house. No help from Motorola either... the response was that I must have done something. Samsung only from this point forward and that's only because I despise Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Battery is life changing
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever owned. Battery is life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Patrick Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews, and most are pretty vicious, but this phone is the best! I upgraded from the Galaxy s7. Mostly it's the battery...I'm an extreme power user and this thing lasts 3x as long as the s7, literally! It must be the combination of the chip, screen and battery, but it just goes on forever. And I notice zero difference in performance or display. Best purchase in years
customer_reviews.author: james d

customer_reviews.title: Not fully T-mobile compatible
customer_reviews.text: This is generally a great phone. The GPU isn't the best, but it comes really close and is extremely power efficient. I've been able to play every 3d game with acceptable results, and the phone will retain power a full week with light usage without charging. Try to do that with an iPhone! My only complaint is that I purchased this thinking it was fully T-mobile compatible, but there's apparently some proprietary libraries that T-mobile only puts on its own branded phones. This phone can use T-mobile SIMs, but it won't run T-mobile apps or do native T-mobile wifi calls. Fortunately, the 4g reception on this phone is great, so wifi calling is less important.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect and according to details provided by seller. 4G works perfectly in Argentina.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting batt, fast charge, beautiful and comes with several improvements ie speaker is the same earphone which i find smart. These phones use to last longer than others, i believe Moto is well enginereed. I ve been using Motorola from years ago without any complaint. My old Moto G 1st gen is still as new, what a good piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Killabyte

customer_reviews.title: Constant Reboots
customer_reviews.text: I loved my previous Moto X, but this phone was a lemon. After a week or two it started rebooting spontaneously. Repeatedly. I called Motorola support, and they quickly replaced it. Second phone - same issue! I went through all of their troubleshooting steps and a few of my own. I reset it and installed no apps, but after a week the second phone did the same thing! I gave up with Motorola support and decided to take a loss on this phone and order something more reliable. I also wasted money on a couple of Moto Mods. Sorry, Moto Z ... I wanted to love you, but you broke my heart ... and my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: W. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this phone makes it my favorite phone ever.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Does not work on all networks.
customer_reviews.text: Not an unlocked phone, that can be used on any network. I have yet to find a network that has the phone listed as compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: Poor multi app performance
customer_reviews.text: Sluggish response. Lenovo does not update the software often. Wonder if they would update at all?
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERIZON PHONE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT A VERIZON PHONE WE WENT TO VERIZON STORE AND IT IS NOT COMPATABLE WITH VERIZON SERVICE!!!
customer_reviews.author: LCole

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I made the change
customer_reviews.text: I found the Moto to be one of the least intuitive smartphones to use. After struggling with it for several weeks, I returned it and opted for a Samsung Galazy S7 Edge after reading many reviews. Several weeks into my Edge, I'm glad I made the change. I was attracted by the Moto Z add-ons, but many of the reviews of the camera and other attachments were not very favorable. This cemented my decision to switch phones.
customer_reviews.author: FriscoMike

customer_reviews.title: That is a good smartphone, but my phone have a problem with ...
customer_reviews.text: That is a good smartphone,but my phone have a problem with its slot cause i can't use my sim card.I believe that was a unlocked phone,and the website said to me then i will use it in my country.I fell very disappointed.I don't turn purchase another again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was not unlocked I tried several times to get it to work did not open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: no working file manger app that sees sdhc card.
customer_reviews.text: why just one star because the moto z play has a crappy file manager. tried to copy files from the internal drive using the moto file manager from playstore well it sucks. the app kept asking me to grant write access permission to write to card stumbled on the answer have to open downloads app and then upper right show sd card then using different file manager the asus app it worked. maybe im wrong but for $400 the device should have a file manger that works. I bought a LG Volt for $35 and the file manger is flawless. the moto e has the same descrepencies as the moto z play.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: PERFORMANCE IS NOT AS GOOD AS ANOTHER 820 SNAPDRANGON I DONT KNOW WHAT HAPPEN ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFORMANCE IS NOT AS GOOD AS ANOTHER 820 SNAPDRANGON I DONT KNOW WHAT HAPPEN HERE SORRY MOTO I LIVE YOUR COMPANY BUT THIS TIME NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Andresbu

customer_reviews.title: The Worst
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was reviewed as the most powerful android on the market and because of the ability to use mods. Very disappointed. Typing on the keyboard is a true test of patience. Not to mention all the ads that randomly pop up and that was even before I added any apps. Can't say it is the phone or the OS but has been the worst phone I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL G.

customer_reviews.title: 32G rom 3G ram but there are better. What lost the stars was a BATTERY THAT ...
customer_reviews.text: 32G rom 3G ram but there are better. What lost the stars was a BATTERY THAT YOU CAN'T REMOVE ! ALL THE BLOATWARE APPS. CAN RUN AS LONG AS THEY WANT AND U CAN'T CUT OFF THE POWER TO THEM . UNDERSTAND NOW ?
customer_reviews.author: R. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone with awesome battery life.  You might get a damaged style shell and Amazon's policy is inconvenient.
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself seems great and the battery life is excellent. I charged it up to 100% and used it throughout the day and then didn't charge it at night just to see how it was doing. 1 day and 2 hours later I was at 15% with 5 hours left. Downside is that the style shell included in mine was bent and didn't fit on the back of the phone properly. Amazon will not simply replace parts and they will require you to send the entire phone back for a full replacement. So it is advisable to check this before setting up the new phone.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: One of the best phones in the last several years!
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is the mediocre camera, but it's still fine. The phone is well built, has a great screen, is very snappy, and has arguably the best battery life of any smartphone. Moto Mods are fun too, but make sure to get a bumper case. I wish the back was metal like the Moto Z rather than glass, but it's still a nice finish just not as durable.
customer_reviews.author: DBurke

customer_reviews.title: No mirroring without a Chromecast
customer_reviews.text: Good phone for the money but what I cannot understand for the life of me why wouldn't Lenovo make their own screen mirroring app instead of relying on Google. I can't screen mirror to my LG 4K TV without going out and buying a Chromecast. I came from the s8+ after I was sold on the mods and how cool and convenient they are. Until they make a Moto Mirror app and their Moto Video app like Samsung this will remain a 3 star review. Its 2017. I should have all the best features within a flagship phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Ricketts Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: A great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Pbeen using this phone for 6 weeks now, and I LOVE it. My phone is always in use...navigating or playing music or tethered to my laptop...and the battery lasts all day, no problem. The fingerprint sensor works really well. The sound is pretty good for listening to music. Call quality is fine. Camera is super-quick.
customer_reviews.author: C. Curvey

customer_reviews.title: Liked it but had to return...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it great phone. Had to return because Verizon claimed they could not activate it through their service. This is an error on their part as originally they told me it would not be an issue. The phone worked perfectly and arrived in perfect condition. Fyi for verizon customers, you HAVE to buy Verizon's of the phone. I spent three days back and forth between my local Verizon store and verizon IT trying to get it to work tried 3 different SIM cards etc. They ended up telling me it wasn't possible after three days of promising it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Moto had done a great job at making a premium phone for a good price. Picked the Z Play over the flagship for the battery life. Happy with decision. Has been a daily carry for some time. Did break the screen once when it slipped off the bathroom vanity onto a tile floor. $100 mistake.
customer_reviews.author: As I See It today

customer_reviews.title: The blue tooth doesn't play nice with the toyota entune system
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth doesn't play nice with the toyota entune system. I tried 2 of these and gave up. It would have static/skipping during the conversations that would end up with me having to ask people to repeat themselves over and over. If it works with other bluetooth systems, I don't know. Everything else on the phone was pretty awesome, too bad about the bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: Moto Z
customer_reviews.text: This product was returned. It was listed as a unlocked cell phone, I took it to my carrier to have my SIM card from my old phone transferred to it and they told me it was an was not a unlocked phone and was unable to unlock it. Also the phone showed quite a bit of wear from the previous refurbish Etc
customer_reviews.author: hwat

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone, battery life and speed are the biggest ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, battery life and speed are the biggest positives. Fingerprint scanner is better than any other I've used, it's fast and easy. Camera is great, good size for me. Everything else is par, no negatives
customer_reviews.author: Bob m notreallymyname

customer_reviews.title: Major Flaw! Battery will swell & lift screen
customer_reviews.text: Phone has a major flaw, as the battery will swell and eventually lift the screen. You'll get signs of the phone blanking out when calls come in or the fingerprint scanner working intermittently. Had an RMA for before the warranty was up that i didn't get to use because i didn't have a backup phone. But now thats expires 2 months out and will cost $150 just for inspection. Will move on from Motorola
customer_reviews.author: D. madden

customer_reviews.title: Solid performer, Another great Motorola phone.
customer_reviews.text: Solid performing phone. Great battery life. High quality build. My only issue is the sides are slippery without a case or a mod attached to grip to. Get a case ASAP. Screen is great. AMOLED, can't go wrong. I have the Moto z force Droid too, they are well done phones.
customer_reviews.author: William Stordeur

customer_reviews.title: Might be best stock battery life on the market. With an Incipio mod pack, this phone might last four days.
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best phone you can buy in the $300-$450 range.
customer_reviews.author: Dongus McSkooglenuts

customer_reviews.title: need customer service phone number in the US. Please. thanks
customer_reviews.text: our son Dennis Malone bought it with Leola Malone's credit card. I have a reference number
customer_reviews.author: GG MA

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I ever got. The battery lasts the whole day even if I take a lot of pictures and use LTE, I only am careful to keep the screen light as low as possible. Games work perfectly, it heats up a bit because of its super fast charging, but it's an awesome phone. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dipold

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great then update 7.1.1 happened
customer_reviews.text: Avoid for now - update 7.1.1 destroyed the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Zayas Nazario

product_meta.title: Motorola Moto Z Play 32GB 4G LTE GSM Global - NO CDMA - Black (Unlocked)
product_meta.description: Style:Phone OnlyMoto Z Play and Moto mods transform your mobile experience in a snap. Plus you can play for days on a single charge with moto’s longest lasting battery ever* all in a thin, elegant design. *All battery life Claims are approximate and based on a mixed use profile (which includes both usage and standby time) under optimal network conditions. Actual battery performance will vary and depends on many factors including signal strength, network configuration, age of battery, operating temperature, features selected, device Settings, and voice, data, and other application usage patterns. Refer to user manual for troubleshooting steps.
feature_bullets: Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon Sprint Boost. SIM International model phone, Does NOT have US warranty. Will work with Most GSM SIM cards in U.S. and world Including AT&T, T-Mobile, MetroPCS
32GB Storage (28GB User) 4GB RAM Quad Core 1.8 Ghz Adreno 530 GPU Natural
Fingerprint reader Accelerometer Ambient Light Gyroscope Hall Effect Magnetometer Proximity
Unlocked and compatible with GSM networks like T-Mobile and AT&T.
